name: Resurgence: Earth United
description: Resurgence is a action RPG, where you dawn humanity's "armor" of the future. Teams of 4 can enter Earth's new Colosseum and Pilot the R.A.V MK II and fight endless waves slowly becoming the wall that stands between humanity and our would be destroyers from the stars.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit: Win 7, Win 8. Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz. | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460. | AMD Radeon HD 5850. DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
